backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI cleanup and logo fixes with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and functionality of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers plus extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and global background/text setup.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, favicon, solid light background, and mounts the React app.
frontend/postcss.config.cjs: PostCSS config enabling Tailwind and autoprefixer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering header, hero, menu sections, social icons, and business info with revealable sections.
frontend/src/components/LocationMapPrevi: Map preview with iframe loading logic and automatic fallback card if embedding fails or times out.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryGrid: Renders category banner, HND watermark, and animated grid of menu items.
frontend/src/components/MenuItemCard.tsx: Menu item card with price display, animations, and WhatsApp ordering with optional variant selection dialog.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBasicSpec: Implements a tabbed UI showing premium, basic, and special panels with animated cards and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/RevealableSectio: Wraps content in a Section and handles reveal/hide with fade-in/fade-out animation logic.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that swaps to a fallback source if the main image fails to load and resets on src change.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Provides a styled section wrapper with variant-based background classes and fade-in animation.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Renders a fixed header with logo and navigation buttons that trigger section navigation.
frontend/src/content/business.ts: Stores business details, menu image helpers, social links, hours, contact info, and address configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actors based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Sets up Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query backend hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealableSections: Tracks the active section and controls reveal state and scroll behavior for page sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom color variables for light/dark themes, global resets, scrollbar hiding, and animation keyframes/utilities.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Provides utilities to derive menu item variants and generate WhatsApp deep links with prefilled order messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using ReactDOM, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and imports global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, plugins, and content paths based on CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current state, requirements, issues, and branding/theme directives for ongoing development.
